author: Darlene Superville / AP
title: Stanley Chera, Real Estate Developer and President Trump’s Friend, Dies After Coronavirus Infection
description: Trump first spoke about his friend on March 29 as he described the “viciousness” of the disease
content:
(WASHINGTON) — A friend and donor to President Donald Trump who the president had said was in a coma and seriously ill after becoming infected with the coronavirus has died.
Stanley I. Chera’s death Saturday was reported by The Real Deal, which covers the Ne… [+2483 chars]
